title: STAT+: White House unveils largest batch of drug pricing agreements yet
description: Nine drugmakers are set to unveil deals with the Trump administration to lower the prices of some of their drugs, marking the administration’s largest such deal to date.
content: Nine drugmakers are set to unveil deals with the Trump administration to lower the prices of some of their drugs, marking the administration’s largest such deal to date.
